title: [Caffe2] Error C2370 when compiling DLL.
body_html:
Issue description

Getting error C2370 when compiling as DLL.
For example:

error C2370: 'caffe2::FLAGS_caffe2_use_fatal_for_enforce': redefinition; different storage class

System Info

  • PyTorch or Caffe2: C2
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source
  • Build command you used (if compiling from source): cmake
  • OS: Win10
  • PyTorch version: master
  • VS version (if compiling from source): 2017
  • CMake version: 3.12

body:
## Issue description

Getting error `C2370` when compiling as DLL.
For example:
```
error C2370: 'caffe2::FLAGS_caffe2_use_fatal_for_enforce': redefinition; different storage class
```

## System Info

- PyTorch or Caffe2: C2
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source
- Build command you used (if compiling from source): cmake
- OS: Win10
- PyTorch version: master
- VS version (if compiling from source): 2017
- CMake version: 3.12
